headline: Frogmore Stew
name: Frogmore Stew
description: Frogmore stew is a traditional South Carolina low country boil made with unpeeled shrimp, corn on the cob, new red potatoes, and hot smoked sausage.
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds hot smoked sausage links, cut into 2 inch pieces
12 ears corn - husked, cleaned and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Bring water and Old Bay seasoning to a boil in a large stockpot over high heat.
Add potatoes; cook for 15 minutes. Add sausage; cook for 5 more minutes. Add corn; cook for 5 more minutes. Stir in shrimp; cook until shrimp are pink, about 5 minutes. Drain immediately and serve.
